The armour of the Fire Dragons is adorned with many spines and overlapping plates designed to help turn aside enemy attacks. At a psychic imperative from their Exarch, the squad?s movements shift subtly to take best advantage of their armour, increasing their AP by +4 while this power remains in effect.

Improvements: If the Exarch spends an additional point of Cohesion to activate this Defensive Stance, the bonus AP increases to +8.
